title: Course on Enhancing Power System Resilience Using Neural Network-Based Distributed Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Enhancing the competency of power company practitioners to design optimal load shedding (OLS) solutions based on distributed learning applicable to real-world tasks

learning_goals: Learners can establish a real-time optimal load-shedding (OLS) strategy within 15 minutes during a power system crisis.
Learners can design a distributed OLS solution using only local measurement data via a neural network model.
Learners can verify the efficiency of the proposed method with over 90% accuracy in an IEEE 118-bus system simulation environment.
Learners can propose a distributed learning design plan that reduces communication load by over 70% in large-scale power grids.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
